title: Pool Party Rewards Distribution [COMPLETE]
body:
Hello everyone,

Mystery Champion rewards are still in the process of distribution for all Riot Regions. There is no specific ETA as to when it will be completed, but we will update this once it has finished!

**I will update this thread when the rollout is complete.**

-Riot Cochese

**EDIT:** see first comment below

replies.body:
All rewards have now been released.

The fine print:

* For the Pool Party icon and Pool Party Mundo, you’ll need to contribute points during Team Up Week.
* For the Mystery Champion, you’ll need to connect League and Facebook.
* For negative players who won’t unlock Pool Party Mundo or the Pool Party icon we took a look at an accounts recent history (February to now) with LeaverBuster, bans, and chat and ranked restrictions to make the call. We expect the vast majority of players to be eligible for the rewards.

Please read [HERE](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/features/team-up-pool-party) for more details on rewards eligibility.

For anyone that feels they should have been granted a gift, please submit a Player Support Ticket [HERE](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) and our team will investigate.
Wait so it's only available to those that won a five man premade and not everyone who also contributed points through the other methods?

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=ByvUQ776,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2015-07-03T06:50:42.363+0000)
>
> Wait so it's only available to those that won a five man premade and not everyone who also contributed points through the other methods?

I posted the FAQ at the top of this thread, I'm sorry that it is confusing. Please read up there, and if you feel you qualified to receive a reward, then submit a Player Support ticket for our team to correct.
Literally everyone I know has now received either a skin or a champion, which is starting to make me worry as I have yet to receive one even though I am 100% certain I did everything correct.
Hi i havnt recieved my mystery skin despite connecting my facebook 2 weeks prior, dont know why i havnt recieved it yet

> Mystery Champion rewards are still in the process of distribution for all Riot Regions.

Literally the first sentence...
Well it says that its complete and I havent received mine
If I dont have it by tomorrow then I am going to complain, A LOT!

Or you could pay some attention to the things Cochese has already stated:

> For anyone that feels they should have been granted a gift, please submit a Player Support Ticket [HERE](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) and our team will investigate.

> They have 10 times more players than dis server and all of them received gifts by now.

I was not aware you were on speaking terms with EVERY SINGLE PLAYER on the Korean server.
Man i got trolled by the mystery champ i only had one 3150 champ left (sona) and i got sona out of all of that but meh

Hi there,

At this time i am yet to receive my mystery skin (cause i have less than 10 champs) all my friends have received their items - i know it has nothing to do with leaving the game because i have received the icon, just wondering if  its cause its a skin.

Thanks

> [{quoted}](name=ViktorVonBadmeme,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=ByvUQ776,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-07-03T06:15:06.403+0000)
>
> Hi there,
> 
> At this time i am yet to receive my mystery skin (cause i have less than 10 champs) all my friends have received their items - i know it has nothing to do with leaving the game because i have received the icon, just wondering if  its cause its a skin.
> 
> Thanks

Sorry to hear that, but we will need you to submit a Player Support ticket for our team to investigate. They are able to verify if you earned points and get back to you.
Thanks for the reply :) have just put one through

If only I could link it with Twitter or something. Facebook got disabled for 'inactivity' apparently, very good reason

I wanted mystery champ so much

My Facebook thing got disconnected last night for like a minute for some reason does that mean i don't get it cause it wasn't connected for that few minutes, And would i be getting a mystery skin because i have all the champions...

> [{quoted}](name=ImDuhN00B,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=ByvUQ776,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-02T07:42:43.618+0000)
>
> My Facebook thing got disconnected last night for like a minute for some reason does that mean i don't get it cause it wasn't connected for that few minutes, And would i be getting a mystery skin because i have all the champions...

Not 100% sure what you mean here. If you linked your Facebook and League accounts according to this: By the end of Pool Party. You must connect from 11:59PM PDT on 6/28 through 11:59PM PDT on 6/29 so we can unlock your Mystery Champ. Then you will get the gift.
What happens if you connected to the Facebook thing when it was first implemented? Are you still able to get it?

In the future would you guys ever consider adding a temporary online app that we can access via the website that allows us to input our summoner name and see if we are on the list? Just to stop confusion?
I haven't received mine either, when should I send a ticket in that I haven't gotten it?

Friends I've talked to so far seem to have gotten their champions, the few I've talked to that have them all haven't gotten their skins yet including myself, are we looking at a similar window for that too?

> [{quoted}](name=Murpheus,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=ByvUQ776,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-02T07:37:33.093+0000)
>
> Friends I've talked to so far seem to have gotten their champions, the few I've talked to that have them all haven't gotten their skins yet including myself, are we looking at a similar window for that too?

Yes, some players will have received rewards, but if you did not get your skin or other items - don't worry, it's still being rolled out.
I imagine the window for getting the skins would be the same as that for getting the champions
